title: EMODnet Biology R Tutorials
text: Welcome to the EMODnet Biology R tutorials for geospatial data access and analysis. These tutorials demonstrate how to access and analyze marine biological data from the European Marine Observation and Data Network (EMODnet).

title: EMODnet Biology R Tutorials
text: Welcome to the EMODnet Biology R tutorials for geospatial data access and analysis. These tutorials demonstrate how to access and analyze marine biological data from the European Marine Observation and Data Network (EMODnet).

title: EMODnet Biology R Tutorials
text:
About EMODnet
EMODnet Biology provides open access to marine biological data from European seas, supporting marine research, policy-making, and blue economy initiatives. The data portal offers standardized access to observations on marine species, their distribution, and abundance.

title: EMODnet Biology R Tutorials
text:
Tutorial Series
This website hosts tutorials demonstrating practical marine spatial analysis workflows using EMODnet data:

Tutorial 1: Identifying Protected Areas Affected by Subsea Infrastructure in the North Sea - Accessing and analyzing EMODnet WFS vector layers using emodnet.wfs.
Tutorial 2: Exploring the Overlap Between Zooplankton Distributions and Predicted Plaice Nursery Grounds - Accessing and analyzing EMODnet WCS raster layers using emodnet.wcs.
Tutorial 3: Relating Marine Biodiversity Change to Depth in the North Sea - Combining EMODnet WFS and WCS data by integrating vector and raster data.
Tutorial 4: Exploring Functional Traits Across Seabed Habitats in the Aegean Sea - Integrating EMODnet WFS and WCS with Trait and Environmental Data Sources from Copernicus Marine Service and trait databases.

title: EMODnet Biology R Tutorials
text:
Prerequisites
These tutorials assume familiarity with:

Basic R programming
Geospatial concepts
Working with sf and terra packages

title: EMODnet Biology R Tutorials
text:
Getting Started
Install the required EMODnet packages:

# Install EMODnet packages
pak::pak(c("emodnet/emodnet.wfs", "emodnet/emodnet.wcs"))

# Install spatial data packages
pak::pak(c("sf", "terra"))
